headline: 3 Reasons PFE is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Pfizer’s shares (currently trading at $26.70) have posted a disappointing 10.2% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 3.8% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: BioNTech guides for worse-than-expected 2025 revenue decline
summary: German COVID-19 vaccine maker BioNTech on Monday said that its 2025 revenues would likely fall to between 1.7 billion euros and 2.2 billion euros, prompting a decline in its share price. ...
